name: Doomcaller's Mantle
tooltip:
Doomcaller's MantleLevel 60

Bring the Qiraji Bindings of Dominance, 2 Idols of the Sage, 5 Bronze Scarabs and 5 Bone Scarabs to Andorgos in Ahn'Qiraj.  You must also attain Neutral reputation with the Brood of Nozdormu to complete this quest.

Requirements:
- Qiraji Bindings of Dominance
- Idol of the Sage x 2
- Bronze Scarab x 5
- Bone Scarab x 5
- Brood of Nozdormu:
